name: Bad Attitude, LLC
about: Bad Attitude LLC is a specialized flying school dedicated to enhancing pilot safety and proficiency. Since 2012, we have focused on Aircraft Upset Recovery Training, addressing the leading cause of aircraft accidents and fatalities, loss of control in flight (LOC-I). Our comprehensive ground and flight training programs cater to pilots from student level to ATP, covering both reciprocating and turbo-jet aircraft. Our instructors are Master Aerobatic Instructor accredited and have been selected as the upset training providers for the Eclipse Jet and the Kent. We also offer aerobatic, tailwheel training, and CFI spin endorsements. Our goal is to make you the safest and most proficient pilot you can be.
